thread.section_title: Hotel Aida Marais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Feedback
thread.title_full: Feedback - Review of Hotel Aida Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Henrietta H
title: Feedback
text:
My room was pretty small and next to the elevator, so I heard everything when somebody wanted down or up..
The people at the entrance are nice and helpful.
Breakfast was great.
The picture on the hotel Webseite are not aktuell, they are 10-15 years old..so it's not a new hotel.. compare to the price per night i found it too expensive..((for this price you can get a room in Abu Dhabi in 4* Hotels..)) but it's maybe just Paris..
Paris is really expensive!
You have to take a lot of money..
